Row.Text: [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities receive +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mastery. This resets at the start of each Age. Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% of your total [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per turn when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology Mastery.

[BLIST][LI][icon:YIELD_CITIES] [B]Cities [/B]receive [B]+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]per Age when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] [B]Civic Mastery[/B]. This resets at the start of each Age. [LI]Gain [B][icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]equal to 50% of your total [B][icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]per turn when you complete a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] [B]Technology Mastery[/B].[/LIST]
Likes the Leader with the most Masteries. Dislikes the one with the Least Masteries.
